name: Micro Space (PlayfulFoxStudio)
description:
Message to all pilots: an asteroid belt is approaching Earth, in which enemy forces are hiding. Your task is to fly to the collection point for further shipment to the sector, which you will have to clear. Good luck, Earth Confederation pilots. Micro Space is a small but very peppy arcade game about destroying asteroids and aliens. Minimalistic pixel art, beautiful music and lots of space rocks are waiting for you.

In the game you are waiting for:

  1. Ten bonuses.
  2. Dangerous enemies.
  3.  Lots of asteroids.
  4. Five beautiful compositions.
  5. World leaderboard (Windows only)

The future, if it exists at all. Okay, I'm kidding)

Future:

  1. More bonuses.
  2. More enemies.
  3. If I can, then even bosses are possible.
  4. We will find a use for the "Z" key!
  5. And, of course, bug fixes, if any.

The Linux version unfortunately does not support world leaderboards and gamepads. Also, depending on the distribution, you may need to additionally install dependencies to run the game: libcurl4, libopenal1 and FUSE.
